title: Calculating the maximum capacity of intracellular transport vesicles
excerpt: We answer the question: what is the maximum number of cargo molecules that can be packed into a vesicle?
citation: Ratamero, E.M. and Royle, S.J., 2019. Calculating the maximum capacity of intracellular transport vesicles.

title: Touching proteins with virtual bare hands
excerpt: Visualizing protein–drug complexes and their dynamics in self-made virtual reality using gaming hardware.
citation: Ratamero, E.M., Bellini, D., Dowson, C.G. and Römer, R.A., 2018. Touching proteins with virtual bare hands. Journal of computer-aided molecular design, 32(6), pp.703-709.

title: A deceleration model for bicycle peloton dynamics and group sorting
excerpt: A further refinement of our previous work on pelotons, identifying a deceleration model that extends my initial work.
citation: Trenchard, H., Ratamero, E., Richardson, A. and Perc, M., 2015. A deceleration model for bicycle peloton dynamics and group sorting. Applied Mathematics and Computation, 251, pp.24-34.

title: Collective behavior and the identification of phases in bicycle pelotons
venue: Physica A: Statistical Mechanics and its Applications
excerpt: We use computational models of pelotons to identify phases on cyclists' collective behaviour.
citation: Trenchard, H., Richardson, A., Ratamero, E. and Perc, M., 2014. Collective behavior and the identification of phases in bicycle pelotons. Physica A: Statistical Mechanics and its Applications, 405, pp.92-103.

title: Modelling Peloton Dynamics in Competitive Cycling: A Quantitative Approach
venue: Sports Science Research and Technology Support
excerpt: Initial work on modelling cycling pelotons computationally.
citation: Ratamero, E.M., 2013, September. Modelling peloton dynamics in competitive cycling: a quantitative approach. In International Congress on Sports Science Research and Technology Support (pp. 42-56). Springer, Cham.

title: Modeling Magnetic Resonance Clinical Reports of the Lumbar Spine using OpenEHR Archetypes
venue: XII Congresso Brasileiro de Informática em Saúde
excerpt: Conference presentation of my final undergraduate paper.
citation: Ratamero, E.M., Cook, T., Cavalini, L.T. and Saade, D.C.M., MODELING MAGNETIC RESONANCE CLINICAL REPORTS OF THE LUMBAR SPINE USING OPENEHR ARCHETYPES.

title: RummiTV: An Interactive Game for the Brazilian Digital TV System
excerpt: Conference presentation of our undergraduate internship project.
citation: Santos, J., Ratamero, E., Arruda, J.P., Dantas, M., Sanchez, M.L. and Saade, D.C.M., 2008. RummiTV: An interactive game for the brazilian digital TV system. In Proc. 26th Symp. Brasileiro Telecomun. (pp. 1-6).
